answers.answer: I also have loss of appatite and feeling full earlier then expected is it advisable for me to take a probiotic.
I ahve many dietry restrictions I can't consume: meat, poultry, eggs, alot of dairy products, alot of starches, fried foods spicy foods, sweets, carbonated drinks, peanuts, pinapples and fish.

question: Hello my name is Babbal I am new to the forum. Ok so here is my issue I weigh 230 lbs absolutley unintentional I cannot lose weight no matter what I consume only about a thousand calories a day not because i starve myself because frankly that is my capacity when a growing male my age needs about 2500. Next I have a very very slow digestive system I have GERD take prevacid 30mg twice a day.. After i eat i don't stuff myself I have heaviness and bloating and no amount of exercise can reduce even a pound combined with diet. My thyroid tests diabetes all that were all normal. I am losing my mind I have lack of concentration, fatigue, acanthosis nigricans in all the folds on my body so i have to aplply lotions there several times a day bacause they get dry, have had hemmorhoids for the past three years. Please Please suggest me a suggestion I have had an endoscopy normal results. Please tell me what is wrong with me! Thank You very much!
title: Digestion and Weight
